summarized_judgment: the appellant has challenged the judgment and order dated 5. 3. 2004 passed by the special court established under sub - section of section 5 of the. special court ( trial of offences relating to transactions in securities ) act, 1992 ( 1992 ) passed. the order was placed with m / s tirupati balaji motors, new delhi.

tagline: Gurubachan Singh And Anr vs Ram Niwas on 24 May, 2006
summarized_judgment: the premises in question is situated at station road, ajmer, rajasthan on a monthly rent of rs. 300. it was alleged that the tenants committed default in payment of rent for more than six months. the appellants filed a suit for eviction of the tenants on the grounds of default in pay of rent and for change of user and subletting.

tagline: Shakuntala vs Lt.Col.Mukhtiar Singh & Ors on 7 April, 2008
summarized_judgment: a. k. mathur, aftab alam case no. 15106 of 2006 1. a sister ( plaintiffpetitioner ) is in conflict with her brothers ( defendantsrespondents ) over certain landed properties in rohtak which belonged to their father. their sister had no right or interest in the suit properties.

tagline: Garden Silk Mills Ltd vs Pearl Organics Ltd on 10 April, 2008
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india garden silk mills ltd vs pearl organics ltd on 10 april, 2008. this appeal is of the year 2002. learned counsel for the appellants submits that he does not want to proceed with the appeal and seeks permission to withdraw the same permission is granted.

tagline: Pumyl.Hly.&Ors vs Stat.Mizoram&Ors on 11 January, 2005
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india pumyl. hly. and ors vs stat. mizoram & ors on 11 january, 2005. the provisions of the sixth schedule to the constitution have evolved a separate scheme for the administration of the tribal areas in assam. madc consists of 19 elected members and the election is through adult franchise and 4 members are nominated by the governor.

tagline: Manoj Shah vs Sarita Devi on 28 January, 2008

tagline: Food Corporation Of India vs M/S.Chandu Construction & Anr on 10 April, 2007
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india food corporation of india vs m / s. chandu construction & anr on 10 april, 2007. by the impugned order, the award of rs. 8, 23, 101 / - by the sole arbitrator against claim no 9 has been upheld.

tagline: State Of Karnataka vs Basavaraj Sharanaiah ... on 24 November, 2009
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india state of karnataka vs basavaraj sharanaiah. state has come in appeal before us after the grant of special leave. high court has on an appreciation of the evidence recorded a finding of acquittal. the appeal is dismissed in the aforesaid terms.

tagline: Mahadeo Bhau Khilare (Mane) & Ors vs State Of Maharashtra & Ors on 9 May, 2007
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india mahadeo bhau khilare ( mane ) and ors vs state of maharashtra & ors on 9 may, 2007. appellant no. 2 was appointed as an unpaid candidate in the office of'talathi'appellants had been engaged from time to time in the said post. they used to receive 30 % out of every rupee received by the first respondent for writing of the document by the candidate.
